title: neeko 1.5 root.
body: does riot realise that people can cook their dinner in 1.5 seconds in a teamfight?

replies.body:
yeah it's pretty fucking bad that snare.
doesn't really compare to any other snare other than veigar's maybe on account of the dmg that follows it up.
except morgana damage and neeko damage dont even compare. aswell as the kits they got. neeko has a combo. morgana has nothing but that q.

>
> except morgana damage and neeko damage dont even compare. aswell as the kits they got. neeko has a combo. morgana has nothing but that q.

q + w is a combo
barely a combo damage compared betwen the 2.

> barely a combo damage compared betwen the 2.

it's still a combo lol
theres barely any damage in that combo compared to neeko.
And after it hits one enemy, subsequent hits root for 3 seconds.
